bug.author: brymrsh
bug.summary: MedNIST Example Fails on Colab under MONAI 0.2.0 but works on 0.1.0
bug.description:
Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to Colab and run through example Install MONAI 0.1.0 to see that it works but fails under 0.2.0 Run commands Documented in example
Expected behavior Can you please update example to work under 0.2.0. .

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/brymrsh>@brymrsh</denchmark-link> , Thanks for your bug report!
Could you please help confirm whether the MedNIST tutorial in MONAI is correct? https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/blob/master/examples/notebooks/mednist_tutorial.ipynb Could you please help provide your error log?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wyli>@wyli</denchmark-link> we need to double-check the MedNIST tutorial in Colab. Thanks.

I pulled and ran in my AWS environment and I had same issue. Works for 0.1.0 but fails for 0.2.0.
Thanks, Bryan
